title: Urge Text
content:
I'd like to announce the release of Urge Text, a modern serif with a contemporary twist. Available now, with a special offer on families throughout October from [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414065804/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/urge-text/), [Fontspring](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414065804/http:/www.fontspring.com/fonts/schizotype/urge-text) and [FontBros](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414065804/http:/www.fontbros.com/families/urge-text).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414065804im_/http:/typophile.com/files/UrgeTextTypophile_4261.png)
author: daverowland
